name: ListOrganizationIssuesForUser
description:
Retrieve issues and pull requests for a user in an organization.

Call this tool to list all issues and pull requests assigned to the authenticated user within a specific organization on GitHub. This tool returns both issues and pull requests, identifiable by the `pull_request` key. It is useful for tracking user-specific tasks within an organization.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub organization. It is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: issue_filter
parameters.description: Specifies the type of issues to return: 'assigned', 'created', 'mentioned', 'subscribed', 'all', or 'repos'.

value_schema.description: Indicates which sorts of issues to return. `assigned` means issues assigned to you. `created` means issues created by you. `mentioned` means issues mentioning you. `subscribed` means issues you're subscribed to updates for. `all` or `repos` means all issues you can see, regardless of participation or creation.

parameters.name: issues_state
parameters.description: Specify the state of issues to return: 'open', 'closed', or 'all'.

value_schema.description: Indicates the state of the issues to return.

parameters.name: issue_labels
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of label names to filter issues. Example: `bug,ui,@high`.

value_schema.description: A list of comma separated label names. Example: `bug,ui,@high`

parameters.name: sort_criteria
parameters.description: Defines the attribute to sort the issues by. Options are 'created', 'updated', or 'comments'.

parameters.name: sort_direction
parameters.description: The direction to sort the results by. Accepted values are 'asc' for ascending and 'desc' for descending.

value_schema.description: The direction to sort the results by.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Filter to show notifications updated after this timestamp in ISO 8601 format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

value_schema.description: Only show notifications updated after the given time. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to display per page (maximum 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: result_page_number
parameters.description: Page number of results to fetch, used for pagination. Starts from 1.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
